item.title: Getting Uncomfortable: Portaging Trip in Killarney Provincial Park
item.description: Fun fact: Ontario, Canada has over 330 provincial parks and more lakes than anywhere else on Earth: 20% of the world’s freshwater supply is stored in Ontario’s 250,000 lakes alone!

item.title: AI vs. Creative Writing
